mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT J.ORD_NUM, R.REV_NUM,R.REV_RATE,R.REV_PIC,R.REV_DATE,R.REV_CONT,R.REV_RE,R.USER_ID,R.ORD_NUM,SR.STO_NUM,OP.ORD_PRICE,J.ORD_DATE FROM REVIEW R JOIN STORE_REVIEW SR ON (R.REV_NUM=SR.REV_NUM) LEFT JOIN STORE_INFO SI ON (SR.STO_NUM=SI.STO_NUM) LEFT JOIN ORDER_PRO OP ON (R.ORD_NUM=OP.ORD_NUM) RIGHT JOIN JUMUN J ON (OP.ORD_NUM=J.ORD_NUM) WHERE SI.USER_ID=#{userId} ORDER BY REV_NUM DESC

SELECT J.ORD_NUM, LISTAGG(CAST(M.MENU_NAME AS VARCHAR(1000)),',')WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY M.MENU_NAME) AS REAL_MENU FROM JUMUN_DETAIL J JOIN STORE_INFO SI ON(J.STO_NUM=SI.STO_NUM) JOIN MENU M ON (J.MENU_NUM=M.MENU_NUM) WHERE SI.USER_ID=#{userId} GROUP BY J.ORD_NUM ORDER BY J.ORD_NUM
